price: 18਼ ਉਸ (ਰਸੂਲ) ਨੇ ਆਪਣੇ ਰੱਬ ਦੀਆਂ ਕੁੱਝ ਵੱਡੀਆਂ-ਵੱਡੀਆਂ ਨਿਸ਼ਾਨੀਆਂ ਵੇਖੀਆਂ।
arabic: لَقَدۡ رَأَىٰ مِنۡ ءَايَٰتِ رَبِّهِ ٱلۡكُبۡرَىٰٓ

version.title: Punjabi translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Punjabi by Arif Halim, published by Darussalam

meta.transliteration: laqad raā min āyāti rabbihi al-kub'rā
